233:3: bodhisattvaḥ kila svapuṇyaprabhāvopanatāmānatasarvasāmantāṃ praśāntasvaparacakrādyupadravatvādakaṇṭakāmasapatnāmekātapatrāṃ dāyādyakramāgatāṃ pṛthivīṃ pālayāmāsa|
233:6: viveda lokasya hi sa svabhāvaṃ pradhānacaryānukṛtipradhānam|
233:7: śreyaḥ samādhitsurataḥ prajāsu viśeṣato dharmavidhau sasañje||2||
233:8: dadau dhanaṃ śīlavidhiṃ samādade kṣamāṃ niṣeve jagadarthamaihata|
233:10: atha kadācittadbhujābhiguptamapi taṃ viṣayaṃ sattvānāṃ karmavaiguṇyātpramādavaśagatvācca varṣakarmādhikṛtānāṃ devaputrāṇāṃ durvṛṣṭiparyākulatā kvacitkvacidabhidudrāva|
233:11: atha sa rājā vyaktamayaṃ mama prajānāṃ vā dharmāpacārātsamupanato'nartha iti niścitamatiḥ saṃrūḍhahitādhyāśayatvātprajāsu tadduḥkhamamṛṣyamāṇo dharmatattvajñasaṃmatānpurohitapramukhānbrāhmavṛddhānmatisacivāṃśca taduddharaṇopāyaṃ papraccha|
233:12: atha te vedavihitamanekaprāṇiśatavadhārambhabhīṣaṇaṃ yajñavidhiṃ suvṛṣṭihetuṃ manyamānāstasmai saṃvarṇayāmāsuḥ|
233:13: viditavṛttāntastu sa rājā yajñavihitānāṃ prāṇivaiśasānāṃ karuṇātmakatvānna teṣāṃ tadvacanaṃ bhāvenābhyanandat|
233:14: vinayānuvṛttyā cainānpratyākhyānarūkṣākṣaramanuktvā prastāvāntareṇaiṣāṃ tāṃ kathāṃ tiraścakāra|
233:15: te punarapi taṃ rājānaṃ dharmasaṃkathāprastāvalabdhāvasarā gāmbhīryāvagūḍhaṃ tasya bhāvamajānānā yajñapravṛttaye samanuśaśāsuḥ-
233:16: kāryāṇi rājñāṃ niyatāni yāni lābhe pṛthivyāḥ paripālane ca|
233:17: nātyeti kālastava tāni nityaṃ teṣāṃ kramo dharmasukhāni yadvat||4||
233:20: bhṛtyairivājñā bahu manyate te sākṣādiyaṃ siddhiriti kṣitīśaiḥ|
233:21: śreyāṃsi kīrtijvalitāni cetuṃ yajñairayaṃ te ripukāla kālaḥ||6||
233:22: kāmaṃ sadā dīkṣita eva ca tvaṃ dānaprasaṅgānniyamādarācca|
233:24: sviṣṭyābhituṣṭāni hi daivatāni bhūtāni vṛṣṭyā pratimānayanti|
233:25: iti prajānāṃ hitamātmanaśca yaśaskaraṃ yajñavidhiṃ juṣasva||8||
233:26: tasya cintā prādurabhavat-atidurnyasto batāyaṃ parapratyayahāryapelavamatiramīmāṃsako dharmapriyaḥ śraddadhāno jano yatra hi nāma-
233:27: ya eva lokeṣu śaraṇyasammatāsta eva hiṃsāmapi dharmato gatāḥ|
233:31: viśasyamānaḥ kila mantraśaktibhiḥ paśurdivaṃ gacchati tena tadvadhaḥ|
233:32: upaiti dharmatvamitīdamapyasatparaiḥ kṛtaṃ ko hi paratra lapsyate||11||
233:34: paśurdivaṃ yāsyati kena hetunā hato'pi yajñe svakṛtāśrayādvinā||12||
233:35: hataśca yajñe tridivaṃ yadi vrajennanu vrajeyuḥ paśutāṃ svayaṃ dvijāḥ|
233:36: yatastu nāyaṃ vidhirīkṣyate kvacidvacastadeṣāṃ ka iva grahīṣyati||13||
233:39: tadidamatra prāptakālamiti viniścitya sa rājā yajñārambhasamutsuka iva nāma tatteṣāṃ vacanaṃ pratigṛhyāvocadenan-sanāthaḥ khalvahamanugrahavāṃśca yadevaṃ me hitāvahitamanaso'trabhavantaḥ|
233:43: athainaṃ purohita uvāca-īpsitārthasiddhaye snātu tāvanmahārāja ekasya yajñasya samāptāvavabhṛthe|
233:45: yugapatpuruṣapaśavaḥ sahasraśo hi parigṛhyamāṇā vyaktamudvegadoṣāya prajānāṃ te syuriti|
233:46: astyetaditi brāhmaṇairuktaḥ sa rājā tānuvāca-alamatrabhavatāṃ prakṛtikopāśaṅkayā|
233:47: tathā hi saṃvidhāsye yathodvegaṃ me prajā na yāsyantīti|
233:48: atha sa rājā paurajānapadānsaṃnipātyāvravīt-icchāmi puruṣamedhasahasreṇa yaṣṭum|
233:49: na ca mayārhaḥ kaścidakāmaḥ puruṣaḥ paśutve niyoktumaduṣṭaḥ|
233:50: tadyaṃ yamataḥ prabhṛti vo drakṣyāmi vyavadhūtapramādanidreṇa vimalena cāracakṣuṣā śīlamaryādātivartinamasmadājñāṃ paribhavantaṃ taṃ taṃ svakulapāṃsanaṃ deśakaṇṭakamahaṃ yajñapaśunimittamādāsya ityetadvo viditamastviti|
233:57: asmatpriyahitādanyad dṛśyate na hi te priyam||16||
233:58: iti pratigṛhītavacanaḥ paurajanāpadaiḥ sa rājā janaprakāśenāḍambareṇa pratyayitānamātyānpāpajanopagrahaṇārthaṃ janapadaṃ nagarāṇi ca preṣayāmāsa samantataśca pratyahamiti ghoṣaṇāḥ kārayāmāsa|
233:65: atha tadviṣayanivāsinaḥ puruṣā yajñapaśunimittaṃ duḥśīlapuruṣānveṣaṇādaraṃ tamanvavekṣya rājñastāṃ ca ghoṣaṇāmatibhīṣaṇāṃ pratyahamupaśrṛṇvantaḥ pāpajanopagrahāvahitāṃśca rājapuruṣānsamantataḥ samāpatato'bhivīkṣya tyaktadauḥśīlyānurāgāḥ śīlasaṃvarasamādānaparā vairaprasaṅgaparāṅmukhāḥ parasparapremagauravasumukhāḥ praśāntavigrahavivādā gurujanavacanānuvartinaḥ saṃvibhāgaviśāradāḥ priyātithayo vinayanaibhṛtyaślāghinaḥ kṛta iva yuge babhūvuḥ|
233:67: suśuklabhāvācca viruḍhayā hriyā janaḥ saḥ śīlāmalabhūṣaṇo'bhavat||19||
233:68: yathā yathā dharmaparo'bhavajjanastathā tathā rakṣijano viśeṣataḥ|
233:72: parā manīṣā mama rakṣituṃ prajā gatāśca tāḥ samprati dakṣiṇīyatām|
233:73: idaṃ ca yajñāya dhanaṃ pratarkitaṃ yiyakṣurasmīti yathāpratarkitam||22||
233:74: yadīpsitaṃ yasya sukhendhanaṃ dhanaṃ prakāmamāpnotu sa tanmadantikāt|
233:78: atha te tasya rājñaḥ sacivāḥ paramamiti pratigṛhya tadvacanaṃ sarveṣu grāmanagaranigameṣu mārgaviśrāmapradeśeṣu ca dānaśālāḥ kārayitvā yathāsandiṣṭaṃ rājñā pratyahamarthijanamabhilaṣitairarthavisargaiḥ santarpayāmāsuḥ|
233:79: atha vihāya janaḥ sa daridratāṃ samamavāptavasurvasudhādhipāt|
233:87: na janamabhyarujanprabalā rujaḥ paṭutaraṃ guṇamoṣadhayo dadhuḥ|
233:88: ṛtuvaśena vavau niyato'nilaḥ pariyayuśca śubhena pathā grahāḥ||29||
233:89: na paracakrakṛtaṃ samabhūdbhayaṃ na ca parasparajaṃ na ca daivikam|
233:90: niyamadharmapare nibhṛte jane kṛtamivātra yugaṃ samapadyata||30||
233:91: athaivaṃ pravṛttena dharmayajñena rājñā praśamiteṣvarthijanaduḥkheṣu sārdhamupadravaiḥ pramuditajanasambādhāyāmabhyudayaramyadarśanāyāṃ vasundharāyāṃ nṛpaterāśīrvacanādhyayanasavyāpāre loke vitanyamāne samantato rājayaśasi prasādāvarjitamatiḥ kaścidamātyamukhyo rājānamityuvāca-suṣṭhu khalvidamucyate-
233:94: iti| devena hi paśuvaiśasavācyadoṣavirahitena dharmayajñena prajānāmubhayalokahitaṃ sampāditamupadravāśca praśamaṃ nītā dāridryaduḥkhāni ca śīle pratiṣṭhāpitānām|
233:96: lakṣmeva kṣaṇadākarasya vitataṃ gātre na kṛṣṇājinaṃ
233:100: hiṃsāviṣaktaḥ kṛpaṇaḥ phalepsoḥ prāyeṇa lokasya nayajña yajñaḥ|
233:102: aho prajānāṃ bhāgyāni yāsāṃ gopāyitā bhavān|
233:103: prajānāmapi hi vyaktaṃ naivaṃ syād gopitā pitā||34||
233:105: dānaṃ nāma dhanodaye sati jano datte tadāśāvaśaḥ
233:106: syācchīle'pi ca lokapaṃktyabhimukhaḥ svarge ca jātaspṛhaḥ|
233:109: tadevaṃ kalyāṇāśayā na pāpapratāraṇāmanuvidhīyanta ityāśayaśuddhau prayatitavyam|
233:113: dharmābhyāsaḥ prajānāṃ bhūtimāvahatīti bhūtikāmena dharmānuvartinā bhavitavyamityevamapyunneyam|
233:114: na paśuhiṃsā kadācidabhyudayāya dānadamasaṃyamādayastvabhyudayāyeti tadarthinā dānādipareṇa bhavitavyamityevamapi vācyam|
